title: Карамболь
overview: Carom is a situation in billiards when a ball bouncing off another ball must ricochet into the third. The world is small, and evil deeds, as well as good ones, certainly affect the fate of third people and, as a result, can turn into the most unexpected side - Natalya Silantyeva is a beautiful, young, successful owner of a modeling agency. A loving husband, a wonderful son, a beloved job - what else is needed for happiness? But the quiet life comes to an end when it turns out that her first husband, who was presumed dead, is actually alive. Now too many people want to find him, hoping to reach him through Natalya.
